trans-unit.source: Represents a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 表示快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: ContextMenuStrip replaces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuStrip 替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: You can associate a ContextMenuStrip with any control, and a right mouse click automatically displays the shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将 ContextMenuStrip 与任何控件相关联，并单击鼠标右键自动显示的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: You can show a ContextMenuStrip programmatically by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用以编程方式显示 ContextMenuStrip<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Show%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: ContextMenuStrip supports cancelable <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> events to handle dynamic population and multiple-click scenarios.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuStrip 支持可取消<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing>事件，以处理动态填充和多次单击方案。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>

trans-unit.source: ContextMenuStrip supports images, menu-item check state, text, access keys, shortcuts, and cascading menus.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuStrip 支持图像、 菜单项检查状态、 文本、 访问密钥、 快捷方式，和级联菜单。

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: 以下各项专门用于与都无缝配合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>中所有的方向。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the ContextMenuStrip control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> Shortcut menus are typically used to combine different menu items from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> of a form that are useful for the user given the context of the application.
trans-unit.target: 将在设计时为 ContextMenuStrip 控件上按默认提供的:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>快捷菜单通常用于组合不同的菜单项从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>窗体，可用于用户给出的应用程序的上下文。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a shortcut menu assigned to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to provide menu items for changing the font of the text, finding text within the control, or Clipboard features for copying and pasting text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用快捷菜单分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件将查找控件或复制并粘贴文本的剪贴板功能中的文本的文本字体更改为提供菜单项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can also expose new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> objects in a shortcut menu that are not located within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> to provide situation-specific commands that are inappropriate for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> to display.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以公开新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>快捷菜单中的对象，并不位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>提供有不适合于特定情况命令<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>以显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a shortcut menu is displayed when a user clicks the right mouse button over a control or the form itself.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，当用户单击鼠标右键按钮的控件或窗体本身通过显示快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: Many visible controls, as well as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> itself, have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property that binds the ContextMenuStrip class to the control that displays the shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 许多可见控件，以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>本身，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>将 ContextMenuStrip 类绑定到显示的快捷菜单的控件的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: More than one control can use a ContextMenuStrip.
trans-unit.target: 多个控件可以使用 ContextMenuStrip。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` to add space to the left of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> for a check mark that shows that the menu item is enabled or selected.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`true`将空间添加到左侧的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>项是启用还是选择显示的菜单的选中标记。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`true`默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use this space to the left of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> to display an image for that menu item.
trans-unit.target: 使用左侧的此空间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>才会显示该菜单项图像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Although ContextMenuStrip replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if so desired.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 ContextMenuStrip 替换，并添加了功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>的早期版本中，控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>如果需要的话，以备向后兼容性和将来使用保留。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> class and associates it with the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>类并将其与指定的容器关联。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> is disposed of properly, since it is not a child of the form.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数以确保<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>得以正确处理，因为它不是窗体的子级。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: A component that implements <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that is the container of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 实现的组件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>的容器的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Sets the control to the specified visible state.
trans-unit.target: 将控件设置为指定的可见状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the control visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使控件可见;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last control that caused this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取导致以下情况的最后一个控件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>要显示。

trans-unit.source: Common uses of the SourceControl property include the following: - Adding, removing, enabling, or disabling a menu item during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening> event.
trans-unit.target: SourceControl 属性的常见用途包括以下:-添加、 删除、 启用，或禁用菜单项在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>

trans-unit.source: - Deciding on modifications of a chosen command based on the control that last displayed the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: -确定选命令基于上一次显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>控件的修改

trans-unit.source: The control that caused this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 导致此控件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>要显示。
